The Christmas Trail will not be operating for 2023
/$
$
The Christmas Trail
/$
$
The Christmas Trail is an outdoor Christmas attraction located in Plant City, Florida. We are an outdoor walking trail filled with several different Christmas attractions. Photo ops, a 25ft tall Christmas tree lights show, and even the Jack Frost Ice Show highlight a few of the magical aspects of The Christmas Trail. Along with the trail and other activities guests can purchase an assortment of concessions including marshmallows for roasting and hot chocolate. Santa is also at the Trail nightly for pictures and Jack Frost creates magical snowfalls through the night. We also have vendors and face painting.
/$
$
Christmas Light Walking Trail
Jack Frost Ice Show with live snow
Pictures with Santa at the Santa Claus Experience
Walk to Bethlehem - Nativity Light Maze
Christmas Tree Light Show
'Naughty or Nice' - Christmas Escape Game
Jack Frost Throne Room Picture Op
The Secret Trail - Dancing Christmas Trees
/$
$
​
(Limited number of tickets per night)
Concessions and kid crafts available for sale as well
The trail is set in the woods so some spots on the path may be difficult to get through with strollers, wheelchairs, etc. please be advised. Our staff will be more than happy to assist you in any way we can!
